ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Mankind! Allah's promise is true. Do not let the life of the dunya delude you and do not let the Deluder delude you about Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you people, the promise of God is true. So do not let the life of this world delude you, nor let that (arch) deceiver deceive you about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O people, assuredly Allah's promise is true. So let the life of the world not delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: People, the promise of God is true. Let not the worldly life deceive you. Let not the devil deceive you about God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O people! Allah’s promise is indeed true; therefore do not ever let the worldly life deceive you; nor ever let the great cheat deceive you in respect of Allah’s commands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O mankind! Verily, the promise of Allah is true. So, let not this present life deceive you, and let not the chief deceiver deceive you about Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O men! surely the promise of Allah is true, therefore let not the life of this world deceive you, and let not the archdeceiver deceive you respecting Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O men, God's promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O mankind! Lo! the promise of Allah is true. So let not the life of the world beguile you, and let not the (avowed) beguiler beguile you with regard to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O Men. The promise of God is true. Let not the life of this world deceive you, nor let the Deceiver deceive you about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O mankind! verily the promise of Allah is true. So let not the life of the world beguile you, and with respect to Allah let not beguile you the great be guiler.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O mankind! Allah’s promise is indeed true. So do not let the life of the world deceive you, nor let the Deceiver deceive you concerning Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O men! Certainly the promise of Allah is true. Let not then this present life deceive you, nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O mankind! Verily, the Promise of Allah is true. So let not this present life deceive you, and let not the chief deceiver (Satan) deceive you about Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: People, the promise of Allah is true, so do not let this present life delude you, and do not let the deluder (satan) delude you about Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O people! The promise of God is true; so let not the lowly life seduce you, and let not the Tempter tempt you away from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:5] O mankind! Indeed God’s promise, of resurrection and of other issues, is true. So do not let the life of this world deceive you, from believing in [all of] that, and do not let the Deceiver, Satan, deceive you concerning God, on account of His forbearance and respiting [of sinners in this life].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 mankind) people of Mecca! (Lo! the promise of Allah) i.e. resurrection after death (is true) it will surely happen. (So let not the life of the world) let not what is in the life of the world of comfort and adornment (beguile you) with regard to the obedience of Allah, (and let not the (avowed) beguiler) Satan; and it is said: the falsehoods of the life of this world (beguile you with regard to Allah) with regard to the religion of Allah.
